author's_name_(_зохиогч): DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI DENG RANG GI RIM GROR LAN CHAGS GTOR MA 'BUM THER GTONG BA'I SKABS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA LHA BRIS PA NGAG DBANG BZANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GIS MDZAD PA'I GTOR MA BRGYA RTZA MU THI LA'I KHRI SHING NA JI LTAR GSUNGS PA BZHIN, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
